title: 2015 harrowing skins
body: with us being in October and everything and halloween just around the corner. I have starting to wonder about the 2015 harrowing event and who will get skins this year. Although i have found it pretty hard to come up with any 'good ideas' that riot might come up with. Do you guys have any idea what the skin might be, and what your hoping it is :D{{item:3023}} {{item:3599}} {{item:3159}} {{item:3508}} <------- spooky looking items :3

replies.body: Return of Deathfire Grasp (DFG) for the 2015 harrowing event alongside skins? xD
Well there's a Demonic vi on PBE right now, looks creepy and dark. Maybe that's a first of the harrowing skins...

> [{quoted}](name=Saythes,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=NVXWxvKK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-10T03:13:34.077+0000)
>
> Well there's a Demonic vi on PBE right now, looks creepy and dark. Maybe that's a first of the harrowing skins...

Riot said Demon Vi wasn't a Harrowing skin.
Im hoping for a jinx skin! like vampire hunter jinx or something that fits her crazy personality! {{champion:222}}  {{champion:222}}   {{champion:222}}  {{champion:222}}
Imagine a zombie kench{{champion:223}}  don't get eaten D:

I doubt it'll happen but a 'King of the damned Azir' skin would be awesome, with thresh/kalista/hecarim etc green particle effects, he would look fairly decayed and his armour/clothes would look less than grand. and he would summon zombies/skeltons/ghosts etc.
